official_title: A bill to provide for the striking of medals to commemorate the Louisiana World Exposition.

summary.text: (Measure passed house, amended) Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to strike gold, silver, or bronze medals to commemorate the 1984 Louisiana World Exposition.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the striking of medals to commemorate the Louisiana World Exposition.
